props.actionText: The text used for the action button.
props.headline: A large headline often used for 404 pages.
props.href: The URL the action button links to.
props.justify: Control the justification of the text.
props.textWidth: Sets the width of the text container.
props.to: The URL the action button links to.

events.click:action: Event emitted when the action button is clicked.
